data.persona: I live in the forest under some branches. I carry poison in my fangs that I use to paralyze and eat my prey. If someone steps on my home, I am sure to strike them in the leg.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a Cactus, a Sand for the cacti, and a Dirt here.
The villagers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the villagers that I am not a threat to them so I want to try giving them a hug.
data.mid_motivation: I need to travel to the village and find some villagers
data.long_motivation: I'm going to try to befriend as many villagers as I can in order to prove I'm friendly.
